item.title: Jas Liu (劉傑思)
item.description:
Hi, I’m Jas Liu! (Pronounced “JAY-ce leew”). My pronouns are they/she.

I’m a software engineer on the AI Research team at Morning Consult, building machine learning tools and features at scale for our global polling and survey data platform.

Previously, I worked at an early-stage startup developing integrated automation solutions for biologists. Before that, I was a research assistant at the UChicago Energy & Environment Lab, where I developed predictive analytics ML models and data engineering pipelines for environmental policy research with the U.S. EPA, California Air Resources Board, and other governmental partners.
